title: Dataproc - 2.0.x release versions
abstract:
# Dataproc - 2.0.x release versions
Dataproc prevents the creation of clusters with images versions prior to 2.0.27, which were affected by [Apache Log4j security vulnerabilities](https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/security.html) . Dataproc advises that, when possible, you create Dataproc clusters with the latest sub-minor image versions.See the [Dataproc release notes](/dataproc/docs/release-notes) for specific image and `log4j` update information. **Note:** The Geode interpreter for Zeppelin notebooks is not operational in the 2.0.27 and later images.
| Component        | 2.0.95-debian10/-ubuntu18/-rocky8 2024/03/14 | 2.0.94-debian10/-ubuntu18/-rocky8 2024/03/06 | 2.0.93-debian10/-ubuntu18/-rocky8 2024/02/28 | 2.0.92-debian10/-ubuntu18/-rocky8 2024/02/08 | 2.0.91-debian10/-ubuntu18/-rocky8 2024/02/01 |
|:---------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------|

Apache Hive installations on Dataproc clusters include [HCatalog](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/HCatalog) , but do not include [Hive WebHCat](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat) (see the [Hive WebHCat Optional Component](/dataproc/docs/concepts/components/hivewebhcat) to install Hive WebHCat on a cluster)
